item.title: Emotes not working
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I recently put a case with an emote in it in to my client.java and it should show you nodding your head. But it doesn’t, your player just sits there. How do I fix this? This is where I put the case…

case 185: // clicking most buttons actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jake")) { println_debug("Case 185: " + actionButtonId); } switch (actionButtonId) { case 168: setAnimation(855); // added by Jake break;
PS! I'm using DemolishScape v9 as the source!

Read full topic
